author: rjollos
msg: 0.8dev: Validation that checked for open child tickets had reversed logic. Refs #746.
The validation now checks whether the source ticket //is a parent of// any open tickets.

author: agrieve
msg: CB-6114 Publish blog post for plugins release
Also fixes invalid link warnings in previous two posts.

author: jing9
msg: HDFS-6041. Downgrade/Finalize should rename the rollback image instead of purging it. Contributed by Jing Zhao.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-5714: You can now use one pool of memory for for the HDFS block cache that all collections share.
